name: Robot Laboratory
description:
Game created for Ryan Laley Spring game jam of 2022

You are a robot trying to escape a facility, trying to reach the green pressure plates in each level. 

Controls *IMPORTANT*

In the node editor the first node in the top left is the repeater, any other node connected to this one will fire every 1 second. You can connect nodes with the line tool.

The 4 icons with a wall and an arrow are for detecting if you're next to a wall if that direction. You can connect nodes to these and when you're next to a wall those nodes will fire!

The arrows are telling your player what direction to move in.

To view the map, hit the eye in the bottom right corner.

To start moving, hit the play button.
